## DateApiObject.dayOfWeek() method

Sets day of week zero based, first is monday

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dayOfWeek(day: number): DateApiObject<TDate>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  day | number | Day of week to be set |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DateApiObject](./datetime.dateapiobject.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt;
